metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4556 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The string-translate* procedure in the data-structures unit in CHICKEN before 4.10.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2015-4556` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

chicken-bin - 4.12.0-0.3
libchicken11 - 4.12.0-0.3
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> will be fixed upstream in 4.10

criterions.comment: chicken package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.12.0-0.3').
